data.homeworkTitle: 泌尿系统损伤病人的护理

questions.title: 闭合性尿道裂伤病人尿管留置时间为
病人，男，28岁。横穿马路时，被车从左侧撞倒后出现左腰部疼痛，尿呈红色。该病人出院时，下面健康教育内容不适合的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"如有异常及时复诊","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"出院后3个月内可以剧烈活动","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"避免肾毒性药","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"定期复查","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"加强安全意识避免损伤","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 肾损伤最严重的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"肾挫伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"肾盂部分裂伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"肾皮质部分裂伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"肾全层裂伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"肾蒂损伤","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 病人，男，29岁。车祸致下腹部疼痛1小时入院。查体:会阴部青紫，尿道口有少量鲜红色液体流出，导尿管插入困难，X线检查提示骨盆骨折，病人最可能的诊断是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"前尿道损","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"后尿道损伤","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"膀胱损伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"肾损伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"输尿管损伤","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，女，39岁。因左腰部创伤后出现疼痛2小时。查体:左腰部扪及包块，肉眼血尿，神志清醒，脉搏急速，BP90/60mmHg,该病人最可能是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"肝损伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"脾损伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"左肾损伤","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"急性腹膜损伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"膀胱损伤","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，23岁。骑车时与人相撞，会阴部骑在车梁上，伤后会阴部疼痛。大约30分钟后尿道外口滴血，不能自行排尿，来医院急诊就医。查体:面色苍白，P105次/分，BP 120/80mmHg,呼吸急促，会阴皮下淤血，尿道外口滴血，导尿管不可以插入膀胱。血常规和下腹部平片，未见异常。发生损伤的部位是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"尿道膜部","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"尿道球部","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"阴茎尿道部","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"前列腺尿道部","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"膜上尿道","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 肾损伤起床下地应在
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"无肉眼血尿","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"镜下血尿消失","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"镜下血尿消失后1日","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"镜下血尿消失后3日","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"镜下血尿消失后7日","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 肾损伤处理措施不正确的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"输液","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"输血","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"镇静","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"早期活动","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"应用抗生素","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 尿道球膜部交界处损伤多见于
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"骑跨伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"枪弹、锐器伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"骨盆骨折","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"腰部撞击伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"尿道器械操作不当","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，27岁，右腰部撞伤2小时，局部疼痛，肿胀，有淡红色血尿，初步诊断为右肾挫伤，采用非手术治疗。与肾损伤程度密切相关的信息是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"面色、意识","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"腰部疼痛程度","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"血压、脉搏","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"肢体温度","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"血尿颜色","IsAnswer":false}]
